name: Dr. Dino - Hospital & Doctor Games For Kids boys
name_original: Dr. Dino - Hospital & Doctor Games For Kids boys
description:
***8 different hospital scenes! 28 puzzles & games!
***8 different dinos and help to cure them.
***Cute animations and Dino Stickers as Rewards!
Play with Dr. Dino, be a doctor! Kids can do: Fill teeth, Check Vision & Colorblind, Injection, X-rays and joint broken bones, Check-up, and etc. Dr. Dino includes 8 department: Trauma & Emergency, Orthopedics, Dentistry, Ophthalmology, Otolaryngology, Gastroenterology, Physical Examination and Ward. Every department contains several fun puzzles and mini-games. There are 28 puzzles & mini-games supply for your choice.

Hurry up, Doctor! Dr. Dino needs you! It's so fun and fantastic!
